name: Vintes Mars
description: Experienced one of the best Dental care services at Navana Dental. The clinic is bestowed with superior technology & prolific experts on board.

name: Chris Jemes
description: Been blown away by how professional it is, the cleanliness, everything is sterilized. It's a wonderful centre. It's been a lot of fun to see the quality and the first class way that I have been treated.

name: Markus Linn
description: What I really love about this place is that, they really attend you with very personal care, they customise things for you. Hats off to Navan and thank your for giving me a nice bright smile. I would want you all to come visit dentzz and get a perfect smile..

name: Kristean Venly
description: I was so conscious of my smile earlier, until I got my teeth done with these Magicians - Dr Ian Smith. I am so much more confident and I smile with ease now.The ambience at Navana is very relaxing and soothing, with the soft music playing in the background, its almost like being in a lounge, whilst I am being grilled, with no pain.
